snippet.title: DEPRISION | Teaser The Horror Game Awards 2024
snippet.description:
Join Us for an Unforgettable Experience at The Horror Game Awards 2024 Livestream

We invite you to immerse yourself in the spine-chilling excitement of The Horror Game Awards 2024. This livestream event promises to deliver unparalleled thrills and exclusive content that you won't find anywhere else.

One of the highlights of the evening will be the exclusive premiere of DEPRISION, a game set to redefine the boundaries of horror gaming. Don't miss your chance to get an early glimpse into what's sure to be one of the year's most talked-about titles.

Event Details:

Date: December 14
Time: Argentina: 5:00 PM | USA: 6:00 PM | Spain: 11:00 PM
Where: Live on YouTube at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VxJEQHK7YfI

Secure your spot in the virtual audience and prepare for a night filled with terror, innovation, and celebration of the horror gaming industry. Get ready to experience the horror like never before. See you there!
